Food; {#dvijAtiSezeRa#}
{#yadetadaMDasA#} <ls>Ki. 1. 39</ls>; {#saSeza evAMDasi#}
{#asAvatfpyat#} <ls>Dk. 133</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">157</ls> (supposed
to have in the Veda the senses of
Soma, the herb itself, or its juice,
juice, ghee or boiled rice, but usually
taken to mean ‘food’ only by

commentators). [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>Gr.</ab> {%andhos%}].
